entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 22. Humidex 25. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and after midnight. Showers beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
